events.javadoc: Called when anvil slots change, triggering the result slot to be updated
events.name: AnvilUpdateResultEvent

description.ja: AreaEffectCloud の効果が付与される時に呼び出される。5ティック毎に1回発生する。

events.javadoc:
Called when a lingering potion applies it's effects. Happens
 once every 5 ticks
events.name: AreaEffectCloudApplyEvent

description.ja: 矢がエンティティの本体に入る・存在する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an arrow enters or exists an entity's body.
events.name: ArrowBodyCountChangeEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: コマンドを介したチャットコンポーネントをサーバーが装飾するときに呼び出される。

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: チャットコンポーネントをサーバーが装飾するときに呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when the server decorates a component for chat purposes. This is called
 before AsyncChatEvent and the other chat events. It is recommended that you modify the
 message here, and use the chat events for modifying receivers and later the chat type. If you
 want to keep the message as "signed" for the clients who get it, be sure to include the entire
 original message somewhere in the final message.
 
 See AsyncChatCommandDecorateEvent for the decoration of messages sent via commands
events.name: AsyncChatDecorateEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがチャットした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
An event fired when a Player sends a chat message to the server.
 
 This event will sometimes fire synchronously, depending on how it was
 triggered.
 
 If a player is the direct cause of this event by an incoming packet, this
 event will be asynchronous. If a plugin triggers this event by compelling a
 player to chat, this event will be synchronous.
 
 Care should be taken to check Event.isAsynchronous() and treat the event
 appropriately.
events.name: AsyncChatEvent

description.ja: 非同期で処理されるイベントを表す。

events.javadoc: Represents an event which depends on the result of asynchronous operations.
events.name: AsyncEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがチャットした時に呼び出される。非同期でも同期でも呼び出されることがある。

events.javadoc:
This event will sometimes fire synchronously, depending on how it was
 triggered.
 
 The constructor provides a boolean to indicate if the event was fired
 synchronously or asynchronously. When asynchronous, this event can be
 called from any thread, sans the main thread, and has limited access to the
 API.
 
 If a player is the direct cause of this event by an incoming packet, this
 event will be asynchronous. If a plugin triggers this event by compelling a
 player to chat, this event will be synchronous.
 
 Care should be taken to check Event.isAsynchronous() and treat the event
 appropriately.
events.name: AsyncPlayerChatEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: チャットのプレビュー用にフォーマットする時に呼び出される。このイベントを使用する場合は、AsyncPlayerChatEvent も同じ方法でフォーマットする必要がある。

events.javadoc:
Used to format chat for chat preview. If this event is used, then the result
 of the corresponding AsyncPlayerChatEvent must be formatted in
 the same way.
events.name: AsyncPlayerChatPreviewEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがログインしようとしている時に呼び出される。非同期で処理される。

events.javadoc:
Stores details for players attempting to log in.
 
 This event is asynchronous, and not run using main thread.
events.name: AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: 構造物が生成された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event will sometimes fire synchronously, depending on how it was
 triggered.
 
 The constructor provides a boolean to indicate if the event was fired
 synchronously or asynchronously. When asynchronous, this event can be called
 from any thread, sans the main thread, and has limited access to the API.
 
 If a Structure is naturally placed in a chunk of the world, this
 event will be asynchronous. If a player executes the '/place structure'
 command, this event will be synchronous.

 Allows to register transformers that can modify the blocks placed and
 entities spawned by the structure.
 
 Care should be taken to check Event.isAsynchronous() and treat the event
 appropriately.
events.name: AsyncStructureGenerateEvent

description.ja: 構造物がワールドに自然生成される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a Structure is naturally generated in the world.
events.name: AsyncStructureSpawnEvent

description.ja: タブ補完を行う時に呼び出される。非同期で処理される。このイベントが結果を返す時、標準のタブ補完処理は発生しない。ただし、 TabCompleteEvent は非同期の結果と共に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Allows plugins to compute tab completion results asynchronously.
 
 If this event provides completions, then the standard synchronous process
 will not be fired to populate the results.
 However, the synchronous TabCompleteEvent will fire with the Async results.
 
 Only 1 process will be allowed to provide completions, the Async Event, or the standard process.
events.name: AsyncTabCompleteEvent

description.ja: コウモリが眠ったり起きたりする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a bat attempts to sleep or wake up from its slumber.
 
 If a Bat Toggle Sleep event is cancelled, the Bat will not toggle its sleep
 state.
events.name: BatToggleSleepEvent

description.ja: ビーコンが有効になった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a beacon is activated.
 Activation occurs when the beacon beam becomes visible.
events.name: BeaconActivatedEvent

description.ja: ビーコンが無効になった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a beacon is deactivated, either because its base block(s) or itself were destroyed.
events.name: BeaconDeactivatedEvent

description.ja: ビーコンの効果がプレイヤーに適用される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a beacon effect is being applied to a player.
events.name: BeaconEffectEvent

description.ja: ミツバチが花をターゲットする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a bee targets a flower

events.javadoc: Called when a bee starts pollinating

events.javadoc: Called when a bee stops pollinating
events.name: BeeStopPollinatingEvent

events.javadoc: Called when a Raider is revealed by a bell.

description.ja: ベルが鳴る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a bell is rung.

description.ja: ベルが鳴る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a bell is being rung.
events.name: BellRingEvent

description.ja: ブロックがブロックを破壊する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block forces another block to break and drop items.
 
 Currently called for piston's and liquid flows.
events.name: BlockBreakBlockEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがブロックを破壊する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is broken by a player.
 
 If you wish to have the block drop experience, you must set the experience
 value above 0. By default, experience will be set in the event if:
 
 The player is not in creative or adventure mode
 The player can loot the block (ie: does not destroy it completely, by
     using the correct tool)
 The player does not have silk touch
 The block drops experience in vanilla Minecraft
 
 
 Note:
 Plugins wanting to simulate a traditional block drop should set the block
 to air and utilize their own methods for determining what the default drop
 for the block being broken is and what to do about it, if anything.
 
 If a Block Break event is cancelled, the block will not break and
 experience will not drop.
events.name: BlockBreakEvent

description.ja: ブロックが燃え尽きて破壊される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is destroyed as a result of being burnt by fire.
 
 If a Block Burn event is cancelled, the block will not be destroyed as a
 result of being burnt by fire.
events.name: BlockBurnEvent

description.ja: ブロックを設置しようとした時に呼び出される。設置可能かどうかを確認する。

events.javadoc:
Called when we try to place a block, to see if we can build it here or not.
 
 Note:
 
 The Block returned by getBlock() is the block we are trying to place
     on, not the block we are trying to place.
 If you want to figure out what is being placed, use getMaterial() instead.
events.name: BlockCanBuildEvent

description.ja: アイテムがブロックを用いて調理される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an ItemStack is successfully cooked in a block.
events.name: BlockCookEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがブロック破壊を中断した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player stops damaging a Block.
events.name: BlockDamageAbortEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがブロックを損傷させる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is damaged by a player.
 
 If a Block Damage event is cancelled, the block will not be damaged.
events.name: BlockDamageEvent

description.ja: サーバーがブロックを破棄する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired anytime the server intends to 'destroy' a block through some triggering reason.
 This does not fire anytime a block is set to air, but only with more direct triggers such
 as physics updates, pistons, Entities changing blocks, commands set to "Destroy".
 
 This event is associated with the game playing a sound effect at the block in question, when
 something can be described as "intend to destroy what is there",
 
 Events such as leaves decaying, pistons retracting (where the block is moving), does NOT fire this event.
events.name: BlockDestroyEvent

description.ja: ディスペンサーから装備可能なアイテムが射出され、エンティティに装備される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an equippable item is dispensed from a block and equipped on a
 nearby entity.
 
 If a Block Dispense Armor event is cancelled, the equipment will not be
 equipped on the target entity.
events.name: BlockDispenseArmorEvent

description.ja: ディスペンサーからアイテムが射出される時に呼び出される。このイベントをキャンセルしても射出されたアイテムは減る。BlockPreDispenseEvent を使うことでアイテムの消費もキャンセルできる。

events.javadoc:
Called when an item is dispensed from a block.
 
 If a Block Dispense event is cancelled, the block will not dispense the
 item.
events.name: BlockDispenseEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーによって破壊されたブロックがアイテムとしてドロップする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called if a block broken by a player drops an item.

 If the block break is cancelled, this event won't be called.

 If isDropItems in BlockBreakEvent is set to false, this event won't be
 called.

 This event will also be called if the player breaks a multi block structure,
 for example a torch on top of a stone. Both items will have an event call.

 The Block is already broken as this event is called, so #getBlock() will be
 AIR in most cases. Use #getBlockState() for more Information about the broken
 block.
events.name: BlockDropItemEvent

description.ja: ブロックに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Represents a block related event.
events.name: BlockEvent

description.ja: ブロックが経験値を落とす時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: An event that's called when a block yields experience.
events.name: BlockExpEvent

description.ja: ブロックが爆発する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a block explodes
events.name: BlockExplodeEvent

description.ja:
自然にブロックが溶けたり消滅したりする時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 光源によって雪や氷が溶ける時。
- 燃料ブロックを破壊することなく、時間の経過によって火が消える時。
- 水不足によってサンゴが死んだサンゴに変わる時。
- カメが孵化し、カメの卵が破裂する時。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block fades, melts or disappears based on world conditions
 
 Examples:
 
 Snow melting due to being near a light source.
 Ice melting due to being near a light source.
 Fire burning out after time, without destroying fuel block.
 Coral fading to dead coral due to lack of water
 Turtle Egg bursting when a turtle hatches
 
 
 If a Block Fade event is cancelled, the block will not fade, melt or
 disappear.
events.name: BlockFadeEvent

description.ja: ディスペンサーにアイテムが存在せず、射出されなかった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a block tries to dispense an item, but its inventory is empty.
events.name: BlockFailedDispenseEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが骨粉を使用し、ブロックに変更が生じる時に呼び出される。StructureGrowEvent の後に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called with the block changes resulting from a player fertilizing a given
 block with bonemeal. Will be called after the applicable
 StructureGrowEvent.
events.name: BlockFertilizeEvent

description.ja:
自然にブロックが形成される時に呼び出される。BlockSpreadEvent とは違い、ランダムに形成されないブロックに対して呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 吹雪により雪が積もる時。
- 雪に覆われたバイオームで氷が形成される時。
- 水との接触による黒曜石や丸石の形成される時。
- コンクリートパウダーと水の混合によるコンクリートが成形される時。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is formed or spreads based on world conditions.
 
 Use BlockSpreadEvent to catch blocks that actually spread and don't
 just "randomly" form.
 
 Examples:
 
 Snow forming due to a snow storm.
 Ice forming in a snowy Biome like Taiga or Tundra.
  Obsidian / Cobblestone forming due to contact with water.
  Concrete forming due to mixing of concrete powder and water.
 
 
 If a Block Form event is cancelled, the block will not be formed.
events.name: BlockFormEvent

description.ja: ブロックの変更が起こる時に呼び出される。液体が流れる時とドラゴンの卵がテレポートする時のみ呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Represents events with a source block and a destination block, currently
 only applies to liquid (lava and water) and teleporting dragon eggs.
 
 If a Block From To event is cancelled, the block will not move (the liquid
 will not flow).
events.name: BlockFromToEvent

description.ja:
自然に作物等が成長する時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 小麦
- サトウキビ
- サボテン
- スイカ
- かぼちゃ
- カメの卵

events.javadoc:
Called when a block grows naturally in the world.
 
 Examples:
 
 Wheat
 Sugar Cane
 Cactus
 Watermelon
 Pumpkin
 Turtle Egg
 
 
 If a Block Grow event is cancelled, the block will not grow.
events.name: BlockGrowEvent

description.ja: ブロックが点火された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is ignited. If you want to catch when a Player places
 fire, you need to use BlockPlaceEvent.
 
 If a Block Ignite event is cancelled, the block will not be ignited.
events.name: BlockIgniteEvent

description.ja: ロックされているかを確認する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the server tries to check the lock on a lockable block entity.
 
 See setResult(Result) to change behavior
events.name: BlockLockCheckEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがマルチブロックを設置する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a single block placement action of a player triggers the
 creation of multiple blocks(e.g. placing a bed block). The block returned
 by BlockPlaceEvent.getBlockPlaced() and its related methods is the block where
 the placed block would exist if the placement only affected a single
 block.
events.name: BlockMultiPlaceEvent

description.ja: ブロックの落下確認をする時に呼び出される。高頻度で呼び出されるので処理には注意が必要。

events.javadoc:
Thrown when a block physics check is called.
 
 This event is a high frequency event, it may be called thousands of times per
 a second on a busy server. Plugins are advised to listen to the event with
 caution and only perform lightweight checks when using it.
 
 In addition to this, cancelling the event is liable to leave the world in an
 inconsistent state. For example if you use the event to leave a block
 floating in mid air when that block has a requirement to be attached to
 something, there is no guarantee that the floating block will persist across
 server restarts or map upgrades.
 
 Plugins should also note that where possible this event may only called for
 the "root" block of physics updates in order to limit event spam. Physics
 updates that cause other blocks to change their state may not result in an
 event for each of those blocks (usually adjacent). If you are concerned about
 monitoring these changes then you should check adjacent blocks yourself.
events.name: BlockPhysicsEvent

description.ja: ピストンが動作する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a piston block is triggered
events.name: BlockPistonEvent

description.ja: ピストンが伸びる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a piston extends
events.name: BlockPistonExtendEvent

description.ja: ピストンが縮む時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a piston retracts
events.name: BlockPistonRetractEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがブロックを設置する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is placed by a player.
 
 If a Block Place event is cancelled, the block will not be placed.
events.name: BlockPlaceEvent

description.ja: ディスペンサーからアイテムが射出される時に呼び出される。BlockDispenseEvent の前に呼び出されるので、ディスペンサーのアイテム消費もキャンセルできる。
スカルクセンサーがゲームイベントを受けとる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Sculk sensor receives a game event and hence might activate.

 Will be called cancelled if the block's default behavior is to ignore the
 event.
events.name: BlockReceiveGameEvent

description.ja: レッドストーンの強さが変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a redstone current changes
events.name: BlockRedstoneEvent

description.ja: ディスペンサーが羊の毛も刈る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Event fired when a dispenser shears a nearby sheep.
events.name: BlockShearEntityEvent

description.ja:
ブロックが拡散する時に呼び出される。BlockFormEvent とは違い、ランダムに形成されるブロックに対して呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- キノコが増える時。
- 火が燃え広がる時。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block spreads based on world conditions.
 
 Use BlockFormEvent to catch blocks that "randomly" form instead of
 actually spread.
 
 Examples:
 
 Mushrooms spreading.
 Fire spreading.
 
 
 If a Block Spread event is cancelled, the block will not spread.
events.name: BlockSpreadEvent

description.ja: 醸造が完了する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the brewing of the contents inside the Brewing Stand is
 complete.
events.name: BrewEvent

description.ja: 燃料としてアイテムが醸造台に使用される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an ItemStack is about to increase the fuel level of a brewing
 stand.
events.name: BrewingStandFuelEvent

description.ja: 醸造台が醸造を始めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a brewing stand starts to brew.
events.name: BrewingStartEvent

description.ja: サーバーにブロードキャストメッセージが送信された時に呼び出される。メッセージが非同期で送信された場合、イベントも非同期で呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Event triggered for server broadcast messages such as from
 Server.broadcast(String, String).

 This event behaves similarly to AsyncPlayerChatEvent in that it
 should be async if fired from an async thread. Please see that event for
 further information.
events.name: BroadcastMessageEvent

description.ja: キャンプファイアが調理を開始した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a Campfire starts to cook.
events.name: CampfireStartEvent

description.ja: 大釜の水が増えたり減ったりした時に呼び出される。
プレイヤーがメッセージを送信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Event called when a player sends a message to a server.
events.name: ChatEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 非同期で処理をする AsyncChatEvent を使う。

description.ja: プレイヤーがチャットした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: An event fired when a Player sends a chat message to the server.
events.name: ChatEvent

description.ja: チャンクに関するイベントであることを表す

events.javadoc: Represents a Chunk related event
events.name: ChunkEvent

description.ja: チャンクが読み込まれた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a chunk is loaded
events.name: ChunkLoadEvent

description.ja: 新しいチャンクが作られた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Thrown when a newly generated chunk has finished being populated.
 
 Note: Do not use this to generated blocks in a newly generated chunk.
 Use a BlockPopulator instead.
events.name: ChunkPopulateEvent

description.ja: チャンクの読み込みが停止された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a chunk is unloaded
events.name: ChunkUnloadEvent

description.ja: クライアントが接続する時に呼び出される。全ての接続の初期段階で呼び出されるので、高速で処理する必要がある。

events.javadoc:
Event called to represent an initial client connection.
 
 Note: This event is called at an early stage of every connection, handling
 should be fast.
events.name: ClientConnectEvent

description.ja: コンソールもしくはプレイヤーがコマンドを実行する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when someone executes a command. Velocity will wait for this event to finish
 firing before trying to handle the command and/or forwarding it to the server.
events.name: CommandExecuteEvent

description.ja: アイテムがホッパーによって堆肥になる時に呼び出される。アイテムがコンポスターに移動するのを防ぐには InventoryMoveItemEvent を使う。

events.javadoc:
Called when an item is about to be composted by a hopper.
 To prevent hoppers from moving items into composters, cancel the InventoryMoveItemEvent.
events.name: CompostItemEvent

description.ja: ハンドシェイクが確立された時に呼び出される。非同期で呼び出され、このイベントの処理を待たずに接続を処理します。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a handshake is established between a client and the proxy.
 Velocity will fire this event asynchronously and will not wait for it to complete before
 handling the connection.
events.name: ConnectionHandshakeEvent

description.ja: 新しい接続があった時に呼び出される。接続を効率的に閉じることを可能にする。

events.javadoc:
Represents a brand new connection made to the proxy, allowing for plugins to
 efficiently close a connection, useful for connection throttlers, etc
events.name: ConnectionInitEvent

description.ja: アイテムをクラフトする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the recipe of an Item is completed inside a crafting matrix.
events.name: CraftItemEvent

description.ja: 生き物がスポーンする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a creature is spawned into a world.
 
 If a Creature Spawn event is cancelled, the creature will not spawn.
events.name: CreatureSpawnEvent

description.ja: クリーパーの点火状態が切り替わる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Creeper is ignited either by a
 flint and steel, Creeper.ignite() or
 Creeper.setIgnited(boolean).
events.name: CreeperIgniteEvent

description.ja: クリーパーが雷撃を受ける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Creeper is struck by lightning.
 
 If a Creeper Power event is cancelled, the Creeper will not be powered.
events.name: CreeperPowerEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがプロキシから切断した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a player disconnects from the proxy. This operation can take place
 when the player disconnects due to normal network activity or when the proxy shuts down.
 Operations on the provided player, aside from basic data retrieval operations, may behave in
 undefined ways.

 
   Velocity typically fires this event asynchronously and does not wait for a response. However,
   it will wait for all DisconnectEvents for every player on the proxy to fire
   successfully before the proxy shuts down. This event is the sole exception to the
   AwaitingEvent contract.
events.name: DisconnectEvent

 This event might be cancelled by default depending on
 e.g. DragonBattle.hasBeenPreviouslyKilled() and server configuration.
events.name: DragonEggFormEvent

events.javadoc: Is called when an ElderGuardian appears in front of a Player.

description.ja: アイテムにエンチャントした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an ItemStack is successfully enchanted (currently at

events.name: EnchantItemEvent

description.ja: エンダードラゴンの攻撃フェーズが変わった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an EnderDragon switches controller phase.
events.name: EnderDragonChangePhaseEvent

description.ja: エンダードラゴンが放った火球が衝突し、AreaEffectCloud が発生する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when a DragonFireball collides with a block/entity and spawns an AreaEffectCloud
events.name: EnderDragonFireballHitEvent

description.ja: エンダードラゴンが炎を吐き、AreaEffectCloud が発生する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when an EnderDragon spawns an AreaEffectCloud by shooting flames
events.name: EnderDragonFlameEvent

description.ja: エンダードラゴンが火球を放つ時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when an EnderDragon shoots a fireball
events.name: EnderDragonShootFireballEvent

description.ja: エンダーマンがプレイヤーを攻撃するか決定する時に呼び出される。

Fired when an Enderman determines if it should attack a player or not.

 at the Enderman, according to Vanilla rules.
events.name: EndermanAttackPlayerEvent

description.ja: エンダーマンが逃げた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when entities are loaded.

 The provided chunk may or may not be loaded.
events.name: EntitiesLoadEvent

description.ja: チャンクによってエンティティが読み込まれなくなった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when entities are unloaded.

 The provided chunk may or may not be loaded.
events.name: EntitiesUnloadEvent

description.ja: 何らかの理由でワールドにエンティティが増えた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired any time an entity is being added to the world for any reason (including a chunk loading).
 
 Not to be confused with CreatureSpawnEvent
events.name: EntityAddToWorldEvent

description.ja: エンティティの残り酸素量が変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the amount of air an entity has remaining changes.
events.name: EntityAirChangeEvent

description.ja:
エンティティによってブロックが形成される時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- スノーゴーレムによって雪が形成された時。
- 氷渡りのエンチャントによって氷が形成された時。

events.javadoc:
Called when a block is formed by entities.
 
 Examples:
 
 Snow formed by a Snowman.
 Frosted Ice formed by the Frost Walker enchantment.
events.name: EntityBlockFormEvent

description.ja: エンティティによってドアが破壊される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an Entity breaks a door
 
 Cancelling the event will cause the event to be delayed
events.name: EntityBreakDoorEvent

description.ja: エンティティが繁殖する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when one Entity breeds with another Entity.
events.name: EntityBreedEvent

description.ja: エンティティがブロックを変化させる時に呼び出される。適したイベントが見当たらない時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when any Entity changes a block and a more specific event is not available.
events.name: EntityChangeBlockEvent

description.ja: ブロックによってエンティティが炎上する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a block causes an entity to combust.
events.name: EntityCombustByBlockEvent

description.ja: エンティティによってエンティティが炎上する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity causes another entity to combust.
events.name: EntityCombustByEntityEvent

description.ja: エンティティが炎上する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity combusts.
 
 If an Entity Combust event is cancelled, the entity will not combust.
events.name: EntityCombustEvent

description.ja: アイテムがエンティティによって堆肥になる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is about to be composted by an entity.
events.name: EntityCompostItemEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: ワールドに関するイベントとして定義された PortalCreateEvent を使う。

description.ja: エンティティがポータルを作成する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Thrown when a Living Entity creates a portal in a world.
events.name: EntityCreatePortalEvent

description.ja: ブロックによってエンティティがダメージを受ける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity is damaged by a block
events.name: EntityDamageByBlockEvent

description.ja: エンティティによってエンティティがダメージを受ける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity is damaged by an entity
events.name: EntityDamageByEntityEvent

description.ja: エンティティがダメージを受ける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Stores data for damage events
events.name: EntityDamageEvent

description.ja: エンティティによって使用されているアイテムが、耐久ダメージを受ける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an item on or used by an entity takes durability damage as a result of being hit/used.
 
 NOTE: default vanilla behaviour dictates that armor/tools picked up by
 mobs do not take damage (except via Thorns).
events.name: EntityDamageItemEvent

description.ja: エンティティが死ぬ時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Thrown whenever a LivingEntity dies
events.name: EntityDeathEvent

description.ja: エンティティが乗っているエンティティが降りる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity stops riding another entity.
events.name: EntityDismountEvent

description.ja: エンティティがアイテムをドロップする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Thrown when an entity creates an item drop.
events.name: EntityDropItemEvent

description.ja:
エンティティが染色される時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 羊が染色される時。
- 狼や猫の首輪が染色される時。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity is dyed. Currently, this is called for Sheep
 being dyed, and Wolf/Cat collars being dyed.
events.name: EntityDyeEvent

エンティティがブロックの中に入る時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- ミツバチが巣箱に入る時。

しかし、以下の場合は呼び出されない。
- シルバーフィッシュが石に入る時。EntityChangeBlockEvent が呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an Entity enters a block and is stored in that block.
 
 This event is called for bees entering a bee hive.
 
 It is not called when a silverfish "enters" a stone block. For that listen to
 the EntityChangeBlockEvent.
events.name: EntityEnterBlockEvent

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity enters love mode.
 
 This can be cancelled but the item will still be consumed that was used to
 make the entity enter into love mode.
events.name: EntityEnterLoveModeEvent

description.ja: エンティティに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Represents an Entity-related event
events.name: EntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーに疲労が溜まると呼び出される。4を超える疲労値では、満腹度が1減少する。

events.javadoc:
Called when a human entity experiences exhaustion.

 An exhaustion level greater than 4.0 causes a decrease in saturation by 1.
events.name: EntityExhaustionEvent

description.ja: エンティティが爆発する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity explodes
events.name: EntityExplodeEvent

description.ja: 交配が発生した時に呼び出される。しばらくすると、卵を産む。

events.javadoc:
Called when two entities mate and the mating process results in a fertilization.
 Fertilization differs from normal breeding, as represented by the EntityBreedEvent, as
 it does not result in the immediate creation of the child entity in the world.
 
 An example of this would be:
 
 A frog being marked as "is_pregnant" and laying Material.FROGSPAWN later.
 Sniffers producing the Material.SNIFFER_EGG item, which needs to be placed before it can begin to hatch.
 A turtle being marked with "HasEgg" and laying a Material.TURTLE_EGG later.
 

 The event hence only exposes the two parent entities in the fertilization process and cannot provide the child entity, as it will only exist at a later point in time.
events.name: EntityFertilizeEggEvent

description.ja:
エンティティがブロックのヒットボックスに入る時に呼び出される。キャンセルされるとブロックに入ったことによって起きる処理が実行されない。以下に例を示す。
- 大釜に入り、エンティティが消火される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity enters the hitbox of a block.
 Only called for blocks that react when an entity is inside.
 If cancelled, any action that would have resulted from that entity
 being in the block will not happen (such as extinguishing an entity in a cauldron).
 
 Blocks this is currently called for:
 
     Big dripleaf
     Bubble column
     Buttons
     Cactus
     Campfire
     Cauldron
     Crops
     Ender Portal
     Fires
     Frogspawn
     Honey
     Hopper
     Detector rails
     Nether portals
     Pitcher crop
     Powdered snow
     Pressure plates
     Sweet berry bush
     Tripwire
     Waterlily
     Web
     Wither rose
events.name: EntityInsideBlockEvent

description.ja: エンティティ同士が押し合う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity interacts with an object
events.name: EntityInteractEvent

description.ja: エンティティがジャンプする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity jumps
 
 Cancelling the event will stop the entity from jumping
events.name: EntityJumpEvent

description.ja: エンティティによってエンティティがノックバックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when an Entity is knocked back by the hit of another Entity. The acceleration
 vector can be modified. If this event is cancelled, the entity is not knocked back.
events.name: EntityKnockbackByEntityEvent

description.ja: エンティティが別のエンティティによってノックバックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity receives knockback from another entity.

description.ja: エンティティがノックバックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a living entity receives knockback.

description.ja: エンティティがアイテムをクロスボウに装填する時に呼び出される。

description.ja: エンティティがエンティティに乗る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity attempts to ride another entity.

description.ja: エンティティが移動する時に呼び出される。

Holds information for living entity movement events

Fired when an Entity decides to start moving towards a location.

Triggered when a entity is created in the world by a player "placing" an item

 Note that this event is currently only fired for four specific placements:

description.ja: エンティティがポータルに接触した時に呼び出される。

Called when a non-player entity is about to teleport because it is in

Called before an entity exits a portal.

Called when an entity is ready to be teleported by a plugin.

 Cancelling this event resets the entity's readiness

Called when a potion effect is modified on an entity.

Called when an Entity is removed.

events.javadoc:
Fired any time an entity is being removed from a world for any reason (including a chunk unloading).

description.ja: エンティティが弓で矢を放つ時に呼び出される。

description.ja: エンティティがスポーンする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity is spawned into a world.

events.name: EntitySpawnEvent

events.javadoc: Called when a Spellcaster casts a spell.

description.ja: エンティティを飼い慣らす時に呼び出される。

Called when an Entity targets a LivingEntity and can only target
 LivingEntity's.

description.ja: エンティティが座ったり立ち上がったりする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Is called when an entity sits down or stands up.
events.name: EntityToggleSitEvent

description.ja: エンティティの泳ぎ状態が切り替わる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Sent when an entity's swimming status is toggled.
events.name: EntityToggleSwimEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: Bukkit に追加された EntityTransformEvent を使う。

description.ja: エンティティが別のエンティティに置きかわる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when an entity transforms into another entity
 
 If the event is cancelled, the entity will not transform
events.name: EntityTransformedEvent

description.ja: エンティティが別のエンティティに置きかわる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity is about to be replaced by another entity.
events.name: EntityTransformEvent

description.ja: エンティティからリードが外される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called immediately prior to an entity being unleashed.
events.name: EntityUnleashEvent

description.ja: エンティティに落雷が当たった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when lightning strikes an entity
events.name: EntityZapEvent

description.ja: イベントを表す。

events.javadoc: Dummy class which all callable events must extend.
events.name: Event

description.ja: イベントを表す。

events.javadoc:
Represents an event.

 All events require a static method named getHandlerList() which returns the same HandlerList as getHandlers().
events.name: Event

description.ja: コマンドを実行する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is called whenever someone runs a command
events.name: ExecuteCommandEvent

description.ja: 経験値ボトルから経験値が出る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a ThrownExpBottle hits and releases experience.
events.name: ExpBottleEvent

description.ja: 経験値オーブが合わさる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired anytime the server is about to merge 2 experience orbs into one
events.name: ExperienceOrbMergeEvent

description.ja: エンティティが爆発する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an entity has made a decision to explode.
events.name: ExplosionPrimeEvent

description.ja: プロファイルプロパティが追加された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired once a profiles additional properties (such as textures) has been filled
events.name: FillProfileEvent

description.ja: 花火が爆発する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a firework explodes.
events.name: FireworkExplodeEvent

description.ja: 隣接したブロックによって液面が変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the fluid level of a block changes due to changes in adjacent
 blocks.
events.name: FluidLevelChangeEvent

description.ja: 空腹度が変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a human entity's food level changes
events.name: FoodLevelChangeEvent

description.ja: かまど内でアイテムが燃料として使用される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an ItemStack is successfully burned as fuel in a furnace.
events.name: FurnaceBurnEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがかまどからアイテムを取り出す時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is called when a player takes items out of the furnace
events.name: FurnaceExtractEvent

events.javadoc: Called when an ItemStack is successfully smelted in a furnace.
events.name: FurnaceSmeltEvent

events.javadoc: Called when a Furnace starts smelting.

This event is fired after the PreLoginEvent in
 order to set up the game profile for the user. This can be used to configure a custom profile for
 a user, i.e. skin replacement.

 
   Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before proceeding with the rest of the login
   process, but you should try to limit the work done in any event that fires during the login
   process.

Represents a generic Mojang game event.

 used internally by Sculk sensors.

壁掛けエンティティに関するイベントであることを表す。壁掛けエンティティの例を以下に示す。
- 絵画
- 額縁
- 柵に繋がれたリード

description.ja: インベントリを開いた状態で画面をクリックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a player clicks in an inventory.
 
 Because InventoryClickEvent occurs within a modification of the Inventory,
 not all Inventory related methods are safe to use.
 
 The following should never be invoked by an EventHandler for
 InventoryClickEvent using the HumanEntity or InventoryView associated with
 this event:
 
 HumanEntity.closeInventory()
 HumanEntity.openInventory(Inventory)
 HumanEntity.openWorkbench(Location, boolean)
 HumanEntity.openEnchanting(Location, boolean)
 InventoryView.close()
 
 To invoke one of these methods, schedule a task using
 BukkitScheduler.runTask(Plugin, Runnable), which will run the task
 on the next tick. Also be aware that this is not an exhaustive list, and
 other methods could potentially create issues as well.
 
 Assuming the EntityHuman associated with this event is an instance of a
 Player, manipulating the MaxStackSize or contents of an Inventory will
 require an Invocation of Player.updateInventory().
 
 Modifications to slots that are modified by the results of this
 InventoryClickEvent can be overwritten. To change these slots, this event
 should be cancelled and all desired changes to the inventory applied.
 Alternatively, scheduling a task using BukkitScheduler.runTask(Plugin, Runnable), which would execute the task on the next tick, would
 work as well.
events.name: InventoryClickEvent

description.ja: インベントリ内でアイテムをドラッグした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when the player drags an item in their cursor across
 the inventory. The ItemStack is distributed across the slots the
 HumanEntity dragged over. The method of distribution is described by the
 DragType returned by getType().
 
 Canceling this event will result in none of the changes described in
 getNewItems() being applied to the Inventory.
 
 Because InventoryDragEvent occurs within a modification of the Inventory,
 not all Inventory related methods are safe to use.
 
 The following should never be invoked by an EventHandler for
 InventoryDragEvent using the HumanEntity or InventoryView associated with
 this event.
 
 HumanEntity.closeInventory()
 HumanEntity.openInventory(Inventory)
 HumanEntity.openWorkbench(Location, boolean)
 HumanEntity.openEnchanting(Location, boolean)
 InventoryView.close()
 
 To invoke one of these methods, schedule a task using
 BukkitScheduler.runTask(Plugin, Runnable), which will run the task
 on the next tick.  Also be aware that this is not an exhaustive list, and
 other methods could potentially create issues as well.
 
 Assuming the EntityHuman associated with this event is an instance of a
 Player, manipulating the MaxStackSize or contents of an Inventory will
 require an Invocation of Player.updateInventory().
 
 Any modifications to slots that are modified by the results of this
 InventoryDragEvent will be overwritten. To change these slots, this event
 should be cancelled and the changes applied. Alternatively, scheduling a
 task using BukkitScheduler.runTask(Plugin, Runnable), which would
 execute the task on the next tick, would work as well.
events.name: InventoryDragEvent

events.javadoc:
Called when some entity or block (e.g. hopper) tries to move items directly
 from one inventory to another.
 
 When this event is called, the initiator may already have removed the item
 from the source inventory and is ready to move it into the destination
 inventory.
 
 If this event is cancelled, the items will be returned to the source
 inventory, if needed.
 
 If this event is not cancelled, the initiator will try to put the ItemStack
 into the destination inventory. If this is not possible and the ItemStack
 has not been modified, the source inventory slot will be restored to its
 former state. Otherwise any additional items will be discarded.
events.name: InventoryMoveItemEvent

events.javadoc:
This event is called whenever a player runs a command (by placing a slash
 at the start of their message). It is called early in the command handling
 process, and modifications in this event (via setMessage(String))
 will be shown in the behavior.
 
 Many plugins will have no use for this event, and you should
 attempt to avoid using it if it is not necessary.
 
 Some examples of valid uses for this event are:
 
 Logging executed commands to a separate file
 Variable substitution. For example, replacing
     ${nearbyPlayer} with the name of the nearest other
     player, or simulating the @a and @p
     decorators used by Command Blocks in plugins that do not handle it.
 Conditionally blocking commands belonging to other plugins. For
     example, blocking the use of the /home command in a
     combat arena.
 Per-sender command aliases. For example, after a player runs the
     command /calias cr gamemode creative, the next time they
     run /cr, it gets replaced into
     /gamemode creative. (Global command aliases should be
     done by registering the alias.)
 
 
 Examples of incorrect uses are:
 
 Using this event to run command logic
 
 
 If the event is cancelled, processing of the command will halt.
 
 The state of whether or not there is a slash (/) at the
 beginning of the message should be preserved. If a slash is added or
 removed, unexpected behavior may result.
events.name: PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent

description.ja: 使用可能なコマンドをプレイヤーに送信する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when the list of available server commands is sent to

 Commands may be removed from display using this event, but implementations
 are not required to securely remove all traces of the command. If secure
 removal of commands is required, then the command should be assigned a
 permission which is not granted to the player.
events.name: PlayerCommandSendEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーから切断された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is invoked when a player has disconnected. It is guaranteed that,
 if the server is in online-mode, that the provided uuid and username have been
 validated.
 
 The event is invoked for players who have not yet logged into the world, whereas
 PlayerQuitEvent is only invoked on players who have logged into the world.
 
 The event is invoked for players who have already logged into the world,
 although whether or not the player exists in the world at the time of
 firing is undefined. (That is, whether the plugin can retrieve a Player object
 using the event parameters is undefined). However, it is guaranteed that this
 event is invoked AFTER PlayerQuitEvent, if the player has already logged into the world.
 
 This event is guaranteed to never fire unless AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent has
 been fired beforehand, and this event may not be called in parallel with
 AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent for the same connection.
 
 Cancelling the AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent guarantees the corresponding
 PlayerConnectionCloseEvent is never called.
 
 The event may be invoked asynchronously or synchronously. Plugins should check
 Event.isAsynchronous() and handle accordingly.
events.name: PlayerConnectionCloseEvent
