events.name: PlayerFishEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが植木鉢にアイテムを置いたり、植木鉢からアイテムを取り出したりする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player places an item in or takes an item out of a flowerpot.
events.name: PlayerFlowerPotManipulateEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーのゲームモードが変わる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the GameMode of the player is changed.
events.name: PlayerGameModeChangeEvent

description.ja: ハンドシェイクを行う時に呼び出される。プレイヤーの存在やユーザー名を知る事が出来る最初のイベントである。

events.javadoc:
Event called to represent a player first making their presence and username
 known.
events.name: PlayerHandshakeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーとサーバーがハンドシェイクする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired during a player handshake.
 
 If there are no listeners listening to this event, the logic default
 to your server platform will be run.

 WARNING: TAMPERING WITH THIS EVENT CAN BE DANGEROUS
events.name: PlayerHandshakeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが作物を収穫する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called whenever a player harvests a block.
 
 A 'harvest' is when a block drops an item (usually some sort of crop) and
 changes state, but is not broken in order to drop the item.
 
 This event is not called for when a block is broken, to handle that, listen
 for BlockBreakEvent and
 BlockDropItemEvent.
events.name: PlayerHarvestBlockEvent

description.ja: 表示されているエンティティがプレイヤーから非表示になる時に呼び出される。追跡範囲内にあるかどうかに関係なく呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a visible entity is hidden from a player.
 
 This event is only called when the entity's visibility status is actually
 changed.
 
 This event is called regardless of if the entity was within tracking range.
events.name: PlayerHideEntityEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: Spigot に追加された PlayerSpawnLocationEvent を使う。

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーに参加した後、スポーンしようとしている時に呼び出される。
プレイヤーがエンティティを右クリックする時に呼び出される。クライアントは PlayerInteractEntityEvent に加えてこのパケットを誤って送信する場合がある。 しかし、アーマースタンドを右クリックした場合、このイベントのみが呼び出される。特別な場合を除いて PlayerInteractEntityEvent を使うことを推奨している。

events.javadoc:
Represents an event that is called when a player right clicks an entity that
 also contains the location where the entity was clicked.
 
 Note that the client may sometimes spuriously send this packet in addition to PlayerInteractEntityEvent.
 Users are advised to listen to this (parent) class unless specifically required.
events.name: PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティを右クリックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Represents an event that is called when a player right clicks an entity.
events.name: PlayerInteractEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがオブジェクトや空気を右クリックする時に呼び出される。それぞれの手に対して呼び出される可能性がある。

events.javadoc:
Represents an event that is called when a player interacts with an object or
 air, potentially fired once for each hand. The hand can be determined using
 getHand().
 
 This event will fire as cancelled if the vanilla behavior is to do nothing
 (e.g interacting with air). For the purpose of avoiding doubt, this means
 that the event will only be in the cancelled state if it is fired as a result
 of some prediction made by the server where no subsequent code will run,
 rather than when the subsequent interaction activity (e.g. placing a block in
 an illegal position (BlockCanBuildEvent) will fail.
events.name: PlayerInteractEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーのインベントリスロットが変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a slot contents change in a player's inventory.
events.name: PlayerInventorySlotChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーのアイテムが壊れる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a player's item breaks (such as a shovel or flint and steel).
 
 After this event, the item's amount will be set to item amount - 1
 and its durability will be reset to 0.
events.name: PlayerItemBreakEvent

description.ja:
プレイヤーがアイテムを消費する時に呼び出される。アイテムの例を以下に示す。
- 食べ物
- ポーション
- 牛乳入りバケツ

events.javadoc:
This event will fire when a player is finishing consuming an item (food,
 potion, milk bucket).
 
 If the ItemStack is modified the server will use the effects of the new
 item and not remove the original one from the player's inventory.
 
 If the event is cancelled the effect will not be applied and the item will
 not be removed from the player's inventory.
events.name: PlayerItemConsumeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーのアイテムクールダウンが変更される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when a player receives an item cooldown.
events.name: PlayerItemCooldownEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがアイテムを使用し、その耐久値が減少する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an item used by the player takes durability damage as a result of
 being used.
events.name: PlayerItemDamageEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが額縁のアイテムを追加・削除・回転する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an ItemFrame is having an item rotated, added, or removed from it.
events.name: PlayerItemFrameChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが手に持つアイテムを変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when a player changes their currently held item
events.name: PlayerItemHeldEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーのアイテムが修繕のエンチャントによって耐久値を回復する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Represents when a player has an item repaired via the Mending enchantment.
 
 This event is fired directly before the PlayerExpChangeEvent, and the
 results of this event directly affect the PlayerExpChangeEvent.
events.name: PlayerItemMendEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーに参加した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player joins a server
events.name: PlayerJoinEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがジャンプする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the server detects the player is jumping.
 
 Added to avoid the overhead and special case logic that many plugins use
 when checking for jumps via PlayerMoveEvent, this event is fired whenever
 the server detects that the player is jumping.
events.name: PlayerJumpEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーからキックされる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player gets kicked from the server
events.name: PlayerKickEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが Projectile を発射する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player shoots a projectile.
 
 Notably this event is not called for arrows as the player does not launch them, rather shoots them with the help
 of a bow or crossbow. A plugin may listen to EntityShootBowEvent
 for these actions instead.
events.name: PlayerLaunchProjectileEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが生き物にリードを繋げる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called immediately prior to a creature being leashed by a player.
events.name: PlayerLeashEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが書見台に置かれた本のページを変更する時に呼び出される。
プレイヤーの経験値レベルが変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a players level changes
events.name: PlayerLevelChangeEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: Bukkit に追加された PlayerLocaleChangeEvent を使う。

description.ja: プレイヤーが言語設定を変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the locale of the player is changed.
events.name: PlayerLocaleChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが言語設定を変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player changes their locale in the client settings.
events.name: PlayerLocaleChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがログインしようとする時に呼び出される。PlayerJoinEvent の前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Stores details for players attempting to log in.
 
 Note that this event is called early in the player initialization
 process. It is recommended that most options involving the Player
 entity be postponed to the PlayerJoinEvent instead.
events.name: PlayerLoginEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが機織り機の旗模様を変更する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player selects a banner patten in a loom inventory.
events.name: PlayerLoomPatternSelectEvent

description.ja: サーバーへの接続中に Forge クライアントが MOD 一覧をプロキシに送信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a Forge client sends its mods to the proxy while connecting to a server.
 Velocity will not wait on this event to finish firing.
events.name: PlayerModInfoEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが移動する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Holds information for player movement events
events.name: PlayerMoveEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティの名前を変更する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the player is attempting to rename a mob
events.name: PlayerNameEntityEvent

description.ja: モンスターをスポーンさせるチャンクを計算する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when the server is calculating what chunks to try to spawn monsters in every Monster Spawn Tick event
events.name: PlayerNaturallySpawnCreaturesEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが看板の編集画面を開く時に呼び出される。このイベントがキャンセルされると編集画面が開かれない。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player begins editing a sign's text.
 
 Cancelling this event stops the sign editing menu from opening.
events.name: PlayerOpenSignEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがアイテムの選択機能を使用する時に呼び出される。アイテムをインベントリからホットバーに移動する場合のみ呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Event that is fired when a player uses the pick item functionality (middle-clicking a block to get the appropriate
 item). However, note that this event will only trigger if an item has to be moved from the inventory to the hotbar.
 After the handling of this event, the contents of the source and the target slot will be swapped and the currently
 selected hotbar slot of the player will be set to the target slot.
 
 Note: This event will not be fired for players in creative mode.
events.name: PlayerPickItemEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが地面から矢を拾う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Thrown when a player picks up an arrow from the ground.
events.name: PlayerPickupArrowEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが地面から経験値オーブを拾う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when a player is attempting to pick up an experience orb
events.name: PlayerPickupExperienceEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: Bukkit に追加された EntityPickupItemEvent を使う。

description.ja: プレイヤーが地面からアイテムを拾う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Thrown when a player picks an item up from the ground
events.name: PlayerPickupItemEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがポータルでテレポートする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player is about to teleport because it is in contact with a
 portal which will generate an exit portal.
 
 For other entities see EntityPortalEvent
events.name: PlayerPortalEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがリスポーンした後に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired after a player has respawned
events.name: PlayerPostRespawnEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 非同期で処理をする為に AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent を使う。

description.ja: プレイヤーがログインしようとしている時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Stores details for players attempting to log in
events.name: PlayerPreLoginEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが村人と取引する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player trades with a standalone merchant GUI.
events.name: PlayerPurchaseEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーから退出した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player leaves a server
events.name: PlayerQuitEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが弓を発射し、使用する矢を選ぶ時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player is firing a bow and the server is choosing an arrow to use.
events.name: PlayerReadyArrowEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがレシピブックのレシビをクリックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player clicks a recipe in the recipe book
events.name: PlayerRecipeBookClickEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがレシピブックのレシビをクリックする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player clicks a recipe in the recipe book.
events.name: PlayerRecipeBookClickEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがレシピブックの設定を変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player changes recipe book settings.
events.name: PlayerRecipeBookSettingsChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが新しいレシピを見つける時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player discovers a new recipe in the recipe book.
events.name: PlayerRecipeDiscoverEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがプラグインチャンネルを登録した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This is called immediately after a player registers for a plugin channel.
events.name: PlayerRegisterChannelEvent

description.ja: サーバーから送られたリソースパックリクエストに対してプレイヤーが処理をした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player takes action on a resource pack request sent via
 Player.setResourcePack(java.lang.String).
events.name: PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーに送信されたリソースパックの状態が変更された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when the status of a resource pack sent to the player by the server is
 changed. Depending on the result of this event (which Velocity will wait until completely fired),
 the player may be kicked from the server.
events.name: PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがリスポーンする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player respawns.
events.name: PlayerRespawnEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが激流エンチャントを使用した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when the player activates the riptide enchantment, using
 their trident to propel them through the air.
 
 N.B. the riptide action is currently performed client side, so manipulating
 the player in this event may have undesired effects.
events.name: PlayerRiptideEvent

description.ja: モンスターエッグを使い、スポナーの内容を変える時に呼び出される。
プレイヤーがスポーン地点を設定する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player's spawn is set, either by themselves or otherwise.
 
 Cancelling this event will prevent the spawn from being set.
events.name: PlayerSetSpawnEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが新しいクライアント設定を送信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when the client sends new client settings for the player. This event can
 and typically will be fired multiple times per connection. Velocity will not wait on this event
 to finish firing.
events.name: PlayerSettingsChangedEvent

description.ja:
プレイヤーがブロックに対してハサミを使用する時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- カボチャを彫ったカボチャに変える時。
- 蜂の巣からハニカムを回収する時。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player uses sheers on a block.
 
 This event is not called when breaking blocks with shears but instead only when a
 player uses the sheer item on a block to garner drops from said block and/or change its state.
 
 Examples include shearing a pumpkin to turn it into a carved pumpkin or shearing a beehive to get honeycomb.
events.name: PlayerShearBlockEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティに対してハサミを使用する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player shears an entity
events.name: PlayerShearEntityEvent

description.ja: 別のエンティティからの攻撃により、プレイヤーのシールドが無効になるたびに呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called whenever a players shield is disabled due to an attack from another entity that was capable of disabling the
 shield. This, most commonly, may be another player attacking with an axe.
 
 Notably, this even is distinct from a PlayerItemCooldownEvent and will fire prior to the item going on
 cooldown.
 It follows that, if this event is cancelled, no PlayerItemCooldownEvent is called as the shield is never
 disabled in the first place.
events.name: PlayerShieldDisableEvent

description.ja: 非表示になっていたエンティティがプレイヤーに表示される時に呼び出される。追跡範囲内にあるかどうかに関係なく呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a hidden entity is shown to a player.
 
 This event is only called when the entity's visibility status is actually
 changed.
 
 This event is called regardless of whether the entity was within tracking
 range.
events.name: PlayerShowEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがコマンドを実行させる看板をクリックする時に呼び出される。このコマンドは権限を無視して実行されるため、本来実行できないコマンドも実行される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Player clicks a side on a sign that causes a command to run.
 
 This command is run with elevated permissions which allows players to access commands on signs they wouldn't
 normally be able to run.
events.name: PlayerSignCommandPreprocessEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: プレイヤーが看板を開く時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is fired when a sign is opened by the player.
events.name: PlayerSignOpenEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 実験段階。

description.ja: プレイヤーのスポーン地点が変更される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is fired when the spawn point of the player is changed.
events.name: PlayerSpawnChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーに参加した後、スポーンしようとしている時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when player is about to spawn in a world after joining the server.
events.name: PlayerSpawnLocationEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがスペクテイターモードでエンティティ視点を開始する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Triggered when a player starts spectating an entity in spectator mode.
events.name: PlayerStartSpectatingEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーの統計が増加した時に呼び出される。移動などの高頻度で増加するような一部の統計では呼び出されない。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player statistic is incremented.
 
 This event is not called for some high frequency statistics, e.g. movement
 based statistics.
events.name: PlayerStatisticIncrementEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが石切台のレシピを選択する時に呼び出される。
プレイヤーがスペクテイターモードでエンティティ視点を終了する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Triggered when a player stops spectating an entity in spectator mode.
events.name: PlayerStopSpectatingEntityEvent

description.ja:
プレイヤーがアイテムの使用をやめた時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 弓のひきしぼり
- 食べ物
- スパイグラス

events.javadoc:
Called when the server detects a player stopping using an item.
 Examples of this are letting go of the interact button when holding a bow, an edible item, or a spyglass.
events.name: PlayerStopUsingItemEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがメインハンドとオフハンドのアイテムをホットキーによって交換する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a player swap items between main hand and off hand using the
 hotkey.
events.name: PlayerSwapHandItemsEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが書見台に置いてある本を取る時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a player clicks the button to take a book of a
 Lectern. If this event is cancelled the book remains on the lectern.
events.name: PlayerTakeLecternBookEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンドゲートウェイを用いてテレポートする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Fired when a teleport is triggered for an End Gateway
events.name: PlayerTeleportEndGatewayEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがテレポートする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Holds information for player teleport events
events.name: PlayerTeleportEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが飛行状態を切り替える時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player toggles their flying state
events.name: PlayerToggleFlightEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがしゃがみ状態を切り替える時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player toggles their sneaking state
events.name: PlayerToggleSneakEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが走り状態を切り替える時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player toggles their sprinting state
events.name: PlayerToggleSprintEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティの追跡を開始すると呼び出される。プレイヤーがエンティティを追跡しているかどうかによって、サーバー上のプレイヤーに対するエンティティの可視性が決まります。エンティティがプレイヤーによって追跡されていない場合、エンティティに関するデータがクライアントに送信されないため、そのプレイヤーはエンティティの存在を認識しません。

events.javadoc:
Is called when a Player tracks an Entity.
 
 If cancelled entity is not shown to the player and interaction in both directions is not possible.
 
 Adding or removing entities from the world at the point in time this event is called is completely
 unsupported and should be avoided.
events.name: PlayerTrackEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが村人や行商人と交易をする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player trades with a villager or wandering trader
events.name: PlayerTradeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーによってエンティティに繋げっているリードが外される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called prior to an entity being unleashed due to a player's action.
events.name: PlayerUnleashEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがプラグインチャンネルの登録を解除する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This is called immediately after a player unregisters for a plugin channel.
events.name: PlayerUnregisterChannelEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティの追跡を終了すると呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Is called when a Player untracks an Entity.
 
 Adding or removing entities from the world at the point in time this event is called is completely
 unsupported and should be avoided.
events.name: PlayerUntrackEntityEvent

description.ja: 存在しないエンティティに対して PacketPlayInUseEntity が送られてきた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Represents an event that is called when a player right-clicks an unknown entity.
 Useful for plugins dealing with virtual entities (entities that don't actually spawned on the server).
 
 This event may be called multiple times per interaction with different interaction hands
 and with or without the clicked position.
events.name: PlayerUseUnknownEntityEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーに対する力の向きや大きさが変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the velocity of a player changes.
events.name: PlayerVelocityEvent

description.ja: プラグインが無効になった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a plugin is disabled.
events.name: PluginDisableEvent

description.ja: プラグインが有効になった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a plugin is enabled.
events.name: PluginEnableEvent

description.ja: プラグインに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Used for plugin enable and disable events
events.name: PluginEvent

description.ja: クライアントやサーバーから送信されたプラグインメッセージを受信する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Event called when a plugin message is sent to the client or server.
events.name: PluginMessageEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーまたはサーバーからプラグインメッセージが送信された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a plugin message is sent to the proxy, either from a client (Player) or a server (ServerConnection). Velocity will wait on this event to finish
 firing before discarding the sent plugin message (if handled) or forwarding it to the server.
events.name: PluginMessageEvent

description.ja: ポータルが作成される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a portal is created
events.name: PortalCreateEvent

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when velocity executed a command. This event is called after the event
 is handled.

 Commands can be cancelled or forwarded to backend servers in CommandExecuteEvent.
 This will prevent firing this event.
events.name: PostCommandInvocationEvent

description.ja: サーバーに接続する準備が出来た時に呼び出される。ProxiedPlayer にアクセスできる最初のイベントである。

events.javadoc:
Event called as soon as a connection has a ProxiedPlayer and is ready
 to be connected to a server.
events.name: PostLoginEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが最初のサーバーに参加しようとする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired once the player has been fully initialized and is about to connect to their
 first server. Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before it fires
 PlayerChooseInitialServerEvent with any default
 servers specified in the configuration, but you should try to limit the work done in any event
 that fires during the login process.
events.name: PostLoginEvent

description.ja: ポーションが割れる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a splash potion hits an area
events.name: PotionSplashEvent

description.ja: ブロックの爆発が処理される前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called before a block's explosion is processed
events.name: PreBlockExplodeEvent

description.ja: 生き物がスポーンする時に呼び出される。このイベントの目的はサーバーのパフォーマンスを向上させることであるため、CreatureSpawnEvent が呼び出される全ての状況で呼び出されるわけではない。

events.javadoc:
WARNING: This event only fires for a limited number of cases, and not for every case that CreatureSpawnEvent does.
 
 You should still listen to CreatureSpawnEvent as a backup, and only use this event as an "enhancement".
 The intent of this event is to improve server performance, so it fires even if the spawning might fail later, for
 example when the entity would be unable to spawn due to limited space or lighting.
 
 Currently: NATURAL and SPAWNER based reasons. 
 Also, Plugins that replace Entity Registrations with their own custom entities might not fire this event.
events.name: PreCreatureSpawnEvent

description.ja: エンティティの爆発が処理される前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called before an entity's explosion is processed
events.name: PreEntityExplodeEvent

description.ja: 不完全なプロファイルプロパティの追加を要求している時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when the server is requesting to fill in properties of an incomplete profile, such as textures.
 
 Allows plugins to pre-populate cached properties and avoid a call to the Mojang API
events.name: PreFillProfileEvent

description.ja: ログインを試みる時に呼び出される。Mojang のサーバーでの認証後に取得されるプレイヤーに関連する情報は含まれず、UUID 等は使用することが出来ない。

events.javadoc:
Event called to represent a player first making their presence and username
 known.

 This will NOT contain many attributes relating to the player which are filled
 in after authentication with Mojang's servers. Examples of attributes which
 are not available include their UUID.
events.name: PreLoginEvent

description.ja: プロキシがプレイヤーを Mojang で認証する前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a player has initiated a connection with the proxy but before the proxy
 authenticates the player with Mojang or before the player's proxy connection is fully established
 (for offline mode). Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before proceeding further
 with the login process, but you should try to limit the work done in any event that fires during
 the login process.

 
   As of Velocity 3.1.0, you may cast the InboundConnection to a
   LoginPhaseConnection to allow a
   proxy plugin to send login plugin messages to the client.
events.name: PreLoginEvent

description.ja: Mojang API を用いてプロファイルを検索する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Allows a plugin to intercept a Profile Lookup for a Profile by name
 
 At the point of event fire, the UUID and properties are unset.
 
 If a plugin sets the UUID, and optionally the properties, the API call to look up the profile may be skipped.
 
 No guarantees are made about thread execution context for this event. If you need to know, check
 Event.isAsynchronous()
events.name: PreLookupProfileEvent

description.ja: 金床の使用準備が出来た時に呼び出される。完成アイテムが表示される毎に発生する。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in a slot for repair by an anvil.
events.name: PrepareAnvilEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: このイベントを直接使用せず、PrepareResultEvent を使うことが推奨されている。

description.ja: 砥石の使用準備が出来た時に呼び出される。完成アイテムが表示される毎に発生する。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in a slot for grinding in a Grindstone
events.name: PrepareGrindstoneEvent

description.ja: 砥石のアイテムスロットにアイテムを置く時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in a slot for repair or unenchanting in a grindstone.
events.name: PrepareGrindstoneEvent

description.ja: インベントリにアイテムが置かれ、リザルトスロットのアイテムが置かれる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in a slot and the result is calculated.
events.name: PrepareInventoryResultEvent

description.ja: クラフトの準備が出来た時に呼び出される。材料を並べ、完成アイテムが表示される毎に発生する。
エンチャントの準備が出来た時に呼び出される。完成アイテムが表示される毎に発生する。

events.javadoc:
Called when an ItemStack is inserted in an enchantment table - can be
 called multiple times
events.name: PrepareItemEnchantEvent

description.ja: 結果スロットを含むインベントリにアイテムが配置された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in an inventory containing a result slot
events.name: PrepareResultEvent

description.ja: 鍛治台の使用準備が出来た時に呼び出される。完成アイテムが表示される毎に発生する。

events.javadoc: Called when an item is put in a slot for upgrade by a Smithing Table.
events.name: PrepareSmithingEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがエンティティに攻撃する前に呼び出される。このイベントがキャンセルされると攻撃時のサウンドが再生されなくなる。

events.javadoc:
Called when the player tries to attack an entity.
 
 This occurs before any of the damage logic, so cancelling this event
 will prevent any sort of sounds from being played when attacking.
 
 This event will fire as cancelled for certain entities, with willAttack() being false
 to indicate that this entity will not actually be attacked.
 
 Note: there may be other factors (invulnerability, etc.) that will prevent this entity from being attacked that this event will not cover
events.name: PrePlayerAttackEntityEvent

description.ja: エンティティがスポナーによってスポーンする前に呼び出される。SpawnerSpawnEvent よりも前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called before an entity is spawned into a world by a spawner.
 
 This only includes the spawner's location and not the full BlockState snapshot for performance reasons.
 If you really need it you have to get the spawner yourself.
events.name: PreSpawnerSpawnEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがホワイトリストに登録されているか確認する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fires when the server needs to verify if a player is whitelisted.
 
 Plugins may override/control the servers whitelist with this event,
 and dynamically change the kick message.
events.name: ProfileWhitelistVerifyEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: 非推奨。ProjectileHitEvent を使って、エンティティに当たっているかチェックする。

description.ja: Projectile がエンティティと衝突する時に呼び出される。キャンセルすると Projectile は飛び続ける。

events.javadoc:
Called when a projectile collides with an entity
 
 This event is called before EntityDamageByEntityEvent, and cancelling it will allow the projectile to continue flying
events.name: ProjectileCollideEvent

description.ja: Projectile がエンティティに当たる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a projectile hits an object
events.name: ProjectileHitEvent

description.ja: Projectile が発射される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a projectile is launched.
events.name: ProjectileLaunchEvent

description.ja: タブ補完に使われるコマンドを定義される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the proxy intercepts the command packet
 allowing for plugins to prevent commands being added
 to the clients which might not be wanted.


 Plugin developers, please implement Command.hasPermission(CommandSender)
 properly in favor of this event.
events.name: ProxyDefineCommandsEvent

description.ja: 回復可能な状況で例外が発生した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called whenever an exception is thrown in a recoverable section of the server.
events.name: ProxyExceptionEvent

description.ja: プラグインが初期化された後、接続の受け入れを開始する前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired by the proxy after plugins have been loaded but before the proxy starts
 accepting connections. Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before it begins to
 accept new connections.
events.name: ProxyInitializeEvent

description.ja: サーバーリストからピングされた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the proxy is queried for status from the server list.
events.name: ProxyPingEvent

description.ja: サーバーリストからピングされた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when a request for server information is sent by a remote client, or when the
 server sends the MOTD and favicon to the client after a successful login. Velocity will
 wait on this event to finish firing before delivering the results to the remote client, but
 you are urged to handle this event as quickly as possible when handling this event due to the
 amount of ping packets a client can send.
events.name: ProxyPingEvent

description.ja: クエリ要求を受信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired if proxy is getting queried over GS4 Query protocol. Velocity will wait on
 this event to fire before providing a response to the client.
events.name: ProxyQueryEvent

description.ja: クエリ要求を受信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event will be posted whenever a Query request is received.
events.name: ProxyQueryEvent

description.ja: プロキシがリロードする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when somebody reloads BungeeCord
events.name: ProxyReloadEvent

description.ja: プロキシがリロードした時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is fired when the proxy is reloaded by the user using /velocity reload.
events.name: ProxyReloadEvent

description.ja: プロキシが接続の受け入れを終了した後、プロセスが終了する前に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired by the proxy after the proxy has stopped accepting connections but before the
 proxy process exits. Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before it exits.
events.name: ProxyShutdownEvent

description.ja: フグの状態が変化する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called just before a PufferFish inflates or deflates.
events.name: PufferFishStateChangeEvent

description.ja: レイドに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Represents events related to raids.
events.name: RaidEvent

description.ja: レイドが終わった時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is called when a Raid was complete with a clear result.
events.name: RaidFinishEvent

description.ja: レイドのウェーブが進んだ時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a raid wave spawns.
events.name: RaidSpawnWaveEvent

description.ja: レイドが終了した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a Raid is stopped.
events.name: RaidStopEvent

description.ja: レイドが始まる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Raid is triggered (e.g: a player with Bad Omen effect
 enters a village).
events.name: RaidTriggerEvent

events.javadoc:
A lifecycle event that exposes a Registrar of some kind
 to allow management of various things. Look at implementations of
 Registrar for an idea of what uses this event.
events.name: RegistrarEvent

events.javadoc:
A lifecycle event that exposes a Registrar that is
 reloadable.
events.name: ReloadableRegistrarEvent

description.ja: RCON を介してコマンド入力を受け取った時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a command is received over RCON. See the javadocs
 of ServerCommandEvent for more information.
events.name: RemoteServerCommandEvent

description.ja: 結果を伴うイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Indicates an event that has a result attached to it.
events.name: ResultedEvent

description.ja: 乗ることが可能なエンティティが乗っているエンティティと共に動く時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Triggered when a ridable mob moves with a rider
events.name: RidableMoveEvent

description.ja: 乗ることが可能なエンティティに乗っている時にジャンプを試みた時に呼び出される。
スカルクカタリストによって新しいカーソルが作成される時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Represents an event triggered when a new cursor is created by a SculkCatalyst.
 
 Cursor Definition:
 A cursor in this context is a dynamic marker or pointer generated by the
 SculkCatalyst. It occupies a block and spreads sculk as it moves. It is
 similar to entity, but it is not an entity. Cursors are ticked by the
 tile entity.
 
 Triggers for Cursor Creation:
 
   An entity, when killed and drops experience, within an 8-block radius of a SculkCatalyst.
   An explicit call from a plugin using SculkCatalyst.bloom(Block, int).
 

 The result of BlockEvent.getBlock() is the location that the cursor is spawning at.
events.name: SculkBloomEvent

description.ja: プレイヤー以外がコマンドを実行する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a command is run by a non-player. It is
 called early in the command handling process, and modifications in this
 event (via setCommand(String)) will be shown in the behavior.
 
 Many plugins will have no use for this event, and you should
 attempt to avoid using it if it is not necessary.
 
 Some examples of valid uses for this event are:
 
 Logging executed commands to a separate file
 Variable substitution. For example, replacing ${ip:Steve}
     with the connection IP of the player named Steve, or simulating the
     @a and @p decorators used by Command Blocks
     for plugins that do not handle it.
 Conditionally blocking commands belonging to other plugins.
 Per-sender command aliases. For example, after the console runs the
     command /calias cr gamemode creative, the next time they
     run /cr, it gets replaced into
     /gamemode creative. (Global command aliases should be
     done by registering the alias.)
 
 
 Examples of incorrect uses are:
 
 Using this event to run command logic
 
 
 If the event is cancelled, processing of the command will halt.
 
 The state of whether or not there is a slash (/) at the
 beginning of the message should be preserved. If a slash is added or
 removed, unexpected behavior may result.
events.name: ServerCommandEvent

description.ja: サーバーに接続した時に呼び出される。プレイヤーがログインする前にサーバーに情報を送信する場合等に使う。

events.javadoc:
Not to be confused with ServerConnectEvent, this event is called once
 a connection to a server is fully operational, and is about to hand over
 control of the session to the player. It is useful if you wish to send
 information to the server before the player logs in.
events.name: ServerConnectedEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが接続先サーバーに正常に接続し、接続元サーバーから切断された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired once the player has successfully connected to the target server and the
 connection to the previous server has been de-established.

 
   Note: For historical reasons, Velocity does wait on this event to finish
   firing before continuing the server connection process. This behavior is
   deprecated and likely to be removed in Polymer.
events.name: ServerConnectedEvent

description.ja: サーバーに接続する時に呼び出される。プレイヤーがサーバーに接続するのをキャンセルする場合等に使う。

events.javadoc:
Called when deciding to connect to a server. At the time when this event is
 called, no connection has actually been made. Cancelling the event will
 ensure that the connection does not proceed and can be useful to prevent
 certain players from accessing certain servers.
events.name: ServerConnectEvent

description.ja: サーバーへの接続を切断した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when the player is disconnected from a server, for example during
 server switching.

 If the player is kicked from a server, ServerKickEvent will be called
 instead.
events.name: ServerDisconnectEvent

description.ja: サーバーに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: Miscellaneous server events
events.name: ServerEvent

description.ja: 回復可能な状況で例外が発生した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called whenever an exception is thrown in a recoverable section of the server.
events.name: ServerExceptionEvent

description.ja: サーバーからキックされた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Represents a player getting kicked from a server.
events.name: ServerKickEvent

description.ja: サーバーリストの表示内容を送る要求を受けた時に呼び出される。PaperServerListPingEvent を使うことでより詳細の情報を扱うことができる。

events.javadoc:
Called when a server list ping is coming in. Displayed players can be
 checked and removed by iterating over this event.
 
 Note: The players in iterator() will not be shown in the
 server info if Bukkit.getHideOnlinePlayers() is true.
events.name: ServerListPingEvent

description.ja: サーバーが起動した時、リロードが完了した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: This event is called when either the server startup or reload has completed.
events.name: ServerLoadEvent

description.ja: サーバーがログインプラグインメッセージを送信した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a server sends a login plugin message to the proxy. Plugins have the opportunity to
 respond to the messages as needed. Velocity will wait on this event to finish. The server will
 be responsible for continuing the login process once the server is satisfied with any login
 plugin responses sent by proxy plugins (or messages indicating a lack of response).
events.name: ServerLoginPluginMessageEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: ベータ段階。

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーに接続した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired after the player has connected to a server. The server the player is now connected to is
 available in Player.getCurrentServer(). Velocity will not wait on this event to finish
 firing.
events.name: ServerPostConnectEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがサーバーに接続する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired before the player connects to a server. Velocity will wait on this event to
 finish firing before initiating the connection.
events.name: ServerPreConnectEvent

description.ja: サーバーがリソースパックパケットを送信する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired when the downstream server tries to send a player a ResourcePack packet.
 The proxy will wait on this event to finish before forwarding the resource pack to the user.
 If this event is denied, it will retroactively send a DENIED status to the downstream
 server in response.
 If the downstream server has it set to "forced" it will forcefully disconnect the user.
events.name: ServerResourcePackSendEvent

description.ja: データパックなどのリソースがリロードされた時に呼び出される。カスタムレシピを再登録するために使用することを目的としている。

events.javadoc:
Called when resources such as datapacks are reloaded (e.g. /minecraft:reload)
 
 Intended for use to re-register custom recipes, advancements that may be lost during a reload like this.
events.name: ServerResourcesReloadedEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーが接続先のサーバーを変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a player has changed servers.
events.name: ServerSwitchEvent

description.ja: メインループのチェックが終了した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the server has finished ticking the main loop
events.name: ServerTickEndEvent

description.ja: メインループのチェックが開始した時に呼び出される。
サービスに関するイベントであることを表す。

events.javadoc: An event relating to a registered service. This is called in a ServicesManager
events.name: ServiceEvent

description.ja: サービスが登録された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a service is registered.
 
 Warning: The order in which register and unregister events are called
 should not be relied upon.
events.name: ServiceRegisterEvent

description.ja: サービスの登録が解除された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is called when a service is unregistered.
 
 Warning: The order in which register and unregister events are called
 should not be relied upon.
events.name: ServiceUnregisterEvent

description.ja: クライアント設定を変更した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called after a ProxiedPlayer changed one or more of the following
 (client-side) settings:

 
 View distance
 Locale
 Displayed skin parts
 Chat visibility
 Chat colors
 Main hand side (left or right)
events.name: SettingsChangedEvent

description.ja: 羊が染色された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a sheep's wool is dyed
events.name: SheepDyeWoolEvent

description.ja: 羊の毛が生えた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a sheep regrows its wool
events.name: SheepRegrowWoolEvent

description.ja: シュルカーが新しいシュルカーを生成する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a shulker duplicates itself by spawning a new shulker.
 
 The event is fired prior to the newly created shulker, accessible via getEntity(), being added to the world.
events.name: ShulkerDuplicateEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーによって看板の内容が変わる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a sign is changed by a player.
 
 If a Sign Change event is cancelled, the sign will not be changed.
events.name: SignChangeEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーがスケルトンホースに近づき、落雷が発生する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Event called when a player gets close to a skeleton horse and triggers the lightning trap
events.name: SkeletonHorseTrapEvent

description.ja: スライムが向きを変えようと決めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a Slime decides to change its facing direction.
 
 This event does not fire for the entity's actual movement. Only when it
 is choosing to change direction.
events.name: SlimeChangeDirectionEvent

description.ja: スライムが移動を開始しようと決めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a Slime decides to start pathfinding.
 
 This event does not fire for the entity's actual movement. Only when it
 is choosing to start moving.
events.name: SlimePathfindEvent

description.ja: スライムが死ぬことで分裂した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a Slime splits into smaller Slimes upon death
events.name: SlimeSplitEvent

description.ja: スライムが水や溶岩にいる状態でジャンプしようと決めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a Slime decides to start jumping while swimming in water/lava.
 
 This event does not fire for the entity's actual movement. Only when it
 is choosing to start jumping.
events.name: SlimeSwimEvent

description.ja: スライムがエンティティを標的として移動を開始しようと決めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a Slime decides to change direction to target a LivingEntity.
 
 This event does not fire for the entity's actual movement. Only when it
 is choosing to start moving.
events.name: SlimeTargetLivingEntityEvent

description.ja: スライムがランダムに移動することを決めた時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Fired when a Slime decides to start wandering.
 
 This event does not fire for the entity's actual movement. Only when it
 is choosing to start moving.
events.name: SlimeWanderEvent

description.ja: レシピが鍛治台内で完成すると呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when the recipe of an Item is completed inside a smithing table.
events.name: SmithItemEvent

description.ja: ワールドのスポーン位置が変更された時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
An event that is called when a world's spawn changes. The world's previous
 spawn location is included.
events.name: SpawnChangeEvent

description.ja: エンティティがスポナーによってスポーンする時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when an entity is spawned into a world by a spawner.
 
 If a Spawner Spawn event is cancelled, the entity will not spawn.
events.name: SpawnerSpawnEvent

description.ja: スポンジが水を吸収する時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a sponge absorbs water from the world.
 
 The world will be in its previous state, and getBlocks() will
 represent the changes to be made to the world, if the event is not cancelled.
 
 As this is a physics based event it may be called multiple times for "the
 same" changes.
events.name: SpongeAbsorbEvent

description.ja: ストライダーの体温が変化した時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a Strider's temperature has changed as a result of
 entering or exiting blocks it considers warm.
events.name: StriderTemperatureChangeEvent

description.ja:
植物が成長する時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- 苗木が木に成長する時
- キノコが巨大キノコに成長する時

events.javadoc:
Event that is called when an organic structure attempts to grow (Sapling ->
 Tree), (Mushroom -> Huge Mushroom), naturally or using bonemeal.
events.name: StructureGrowEvent

deprecateDescription.ja: StructuresLocateEvent を使う。

description.ja:
建造物が見つかる時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- /locate コマンドを実行した時
- エンダーアイを使用した時
- 宝の地図が開かれた時

events.javadoc:
Called before a structure/feature is located.
 This happens when:
 
     The /locate command is used.
     An Eye of Ender is used.
     An Explorer/Treasure Map is activated.
     World.locateNearestStructure(Location, StructureType, int, boolean) is invoked.
events.name: StructureLocateEvent

description.ja:
建造物が見つかる時に呼び出される。以下に例を示す。
- /locate コマンドを実行した時
- エンダーアイを使用した時
- 宝の地図が開かれた時
- イルカが構造物の場所を示した時
- 村人と地図の交換をした時

events.javadoc:
Called before a set of configured structures is located.
 This happens when:
 
     The /locate command is used.
     An Eye of Ender is used.
     An Explorer/Treasure Map is activated.
     A dolphin swims to a treasure location.
     A trade is done with a villager for a map.
     World.locateNearestStructure(Location, StructureType, int, boolean) is invoked.
     World.locateNearestStructure(Location, Structure, int, boolean) is invoked.
events.name: StructuresLocateEvent

description.ja: タブ補完を行う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Event called when a player uses tab completion.
events.name: TabCompleteEvent

description.ja: プレイヤーやコンソールがコマンドをタブ補完する時に呼び出される。クライアントの変更により、プレイヤーの場合、コマンド自体では呼び出されず、コマンド引数の場合にのみ呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
Called when a CommandSender of any description (ie: player or
 console) attempts to tab complete.
 
 Note that due to client changes, if the sender is a Player, this event will
 only begin to fire once command arguments are specified, not commands
 themselves. Plugins wishing to remove commands from tab completion are
 advised to ensure the client does not have permission for the relevant
 commands, or use PlayerCommandSendEvent.
events.name: TabCompleteEvent

description.ja: サーバーがタブ補完を行う時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc:
This event is fired after a tab complete response is sent by the remote server, for clients on
 1.12.2 and below. You have the opportunity to modify the response sent to the remote player.
 Velocity will wait for this event to finish firing before sending the tab complete results to
 the client. Be sure to be as fast as possible, since the client will freeze while it waits for
 the tab complete results.
events.name: TabCompleteEvent

description.ja: サーバーがタブ補完を行う時に呼び出される。プロキシによって処理されたタブ補完では呼び出されない。

events.javadoc:
Event called when a backend server sends a response to a player asking to
 tab-complete a chat message or command. Note that this is not called when
 BungeeCord or a plugin responds to a tab-complete request. Use
 TabCompleteEvent for that.
events.name: TabCompleteResponseEvent

description.ja: 飼い慣らしたエンティティが死んでメッセージが送られる時に呼び出される。

events.javadoc: Called when a Tameable dies and sends a death message.

events.javadoc:
Called when a Target Block is hit by a projectile.
 
 Cancelling this event will stop the Target from emitting a redstone signal,
 and in the case that the shooter is a player, will stop them from receiving
 advancement criteria.
